subtitle: A wonderfully easy meal that comes from Tuscany.

method.text: To make the sauce: Wash and dry the spinach, watercress and salad leaves. Tear them into a blender.
Add the remaining ingredients. Blend until required consistency is achieved.
Cook the fresh tortellini according to pack instructions. Drain. Return to pan with the sauce. Reheat briefly, tossing with two spoons.

title: Cheese tortellini in verdi sauce
